subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: After the first week of a six-month season, the Mets are 2-4 and in last place in the National League East, causing an undercurrent of trepidation among fans.
snippet: After the first week of a six-month season, the Mets are 2-4 and in last place in the National League East, causing an undercurrent of trepidation among fans.
